arStrings.szText: While a thrown weapon is out, gain {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.

Swapping weapons near any of your thrown weapons creates an additional pulse. Each extra pulse generates {c_number}[{SF_34} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life as a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_35} ||]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Mighty Throw's{/c} impact deals {c_number}[{SF_36}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage and Stuns enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADE2_STUN}{/c} seconds.
